name: Battery of Power
description:
Story :

"Hello ! I'm tommy ! Yesterday, at night I saw my teddies turned up to monsters! Fortunately there was my awesome RoBot  : Robommy! Help him to kill the maximum number of monsters!!! "

So as you can see you'll play as a little robot and try to survive the maximum number of waves of enemies !!!

 Controls :
  •  Use the arrow keys to move.
  •  Use WASD/ZQSD to shoot in the right direction.
  •  Watch out the battery bar on the top left if you don't want to run out of power.
  •  Avoid the enemies because they'll stole your power.
  •  Collect bateries when you kill enemies to recharge your energy.
  •  Your ammo is your health. 
  •  Don't run out of energy because you'll lose.

Made for the LD39 jam by Aboulkkacem Ghaith Houimel (Belga) in 48hrs. 

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/battery-of-power
